sentence.Network_en: The clock of the Invalides struck one.
sentence.Network_cn: 残废军人疗养院的时钟敲了一下.

sentence.Network_en: He was looking at the dome of the Invalides, which was visible from Bombarda's windows.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时他从蓬巴达的窗口望着残废军人院的圆屋顶.

sentence.Network_en: The Eiffel Tower and the Hotel des Invalides are illuminated at dusk with in Paris.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴黎的埃菲尔铁塔和荣民院在夜幕中光耀夺目.
